zones.name: Citizen Services
zones.description: Data zones focused on citizen-facing services including customer data, tax, vehicle registration, property management, and business services

zones.name: Public Services
zones.description: Data zones covering public service delivery including education, healthcare, housing, and social services

zones.name: Infrastructure
zones.description: Data zones related to physical and digital infrastructure including transportation, utilities, infrastructure planning, and urban planning

zones.name: Governance
zones.description: Data zones supporting governance and administration including finance, legal services, safety, and communications

zones.name: Community
zones.description: Data zones focused on community engagement and quality of life including environment, recreation, cultural activities, and tourism

zones.name: Operations
zones.description: Data zones supporting operational functions including technology infrastructure, agriculture, and property management
